response.overview: When sensible and cautious Justin moves into a share house he encounters a foreign world with its own rules. A magical clock, broken by one of the housemates, distorts time within an already unusual building. The unspoken house leader Merlin, bestows upon Justin the task of restoring time and therefore balance to the house. But not everyone wants time restored and his new housemates are experts at corrupting and seducing the innocent. Can Justin resist their ways before he loses everything?
response.title: Share House Fantasy
